public class BBCodeModel
extends WikiModel

Wiki model implementation which allows some simple additional BB code syntax inside the wiki syntax See BBCode

Method Detail

parseBBCodes

public boolean parseBBCodes()
Description copied from class: AbstractWikiModel
Parse BBCode (Bulletin Board Code), like syntax codes in this wiki. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki /BBCode for more information.

Specified by:
parseBBCodes in interface IWikiModel
Overrides:
parseBBCodes in class AbstractWikiModel
Returns:
true if the bbCodes should be parsed
